entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CodeAction telemetry lacks mechanism to provide sub-categories or other relevant pieces of information #61665
  • Require spaces within the enhanced `#line` directive #61663
  • CSharpCodeFixTest test code with Record keyword, give CS0518 error #61655
  • ExtractMethodRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #61652
    Backlog
  • API proposal: represent `ref` fields and `scoped` parameters and locals #61647

Closed

  • "Extract base class" shouldn't be the first item in the light bulb #61334
    Backlog
  • ReassignedVariable classifier crashed #61503
  • [Feature Request][Interpolated Strings] Add option to automatic add a $ when write a " #61556
  • Can't add semi-colon to end of line #61638
  • [LSP] Simplify semantic tokens token types legend #61237
  • compile error when using function pointer in Expression<> #59454
    17.3
  • Multiple matches for the interface member warning is not reported static members #61553
    C# 11.0
  • Adjust `ITypeSymbol.IsSignedIntegralType` and related APIs for numeric IntPtr #61350
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch backing store for callback-array to an immutable structure so it cannot change as we are enumerating over it. #61671
    Area-IDE
  • Prefer stack storage for highly-contended temporary array #61670
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE
  • Allow SyntaxOffset in EnC state machine map to be negative #61667
    Area-Interactive
  • Do not use `SourceText` indexer when parsing #61662
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert two changes #61660
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixed incorrect discard suggestion in var pattern #61657
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Tweak UTF-8 string literal analyzer and code fix after language change #61650
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the AssemblyMetadata produced for any given compilation #61649
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Move crash to NFW in assignment-underlining #61664
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Deprioritize 'extract base class' when on a member in a type #61666
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove documents as a batch instead of individually #61656
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61668
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Utilize list of all classification types + expose types to Razor #61395
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - Fix bug where trigger character and start of snippet intersect #61633
    Area-IDE
  • Mention sharplab in bug template #61637
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Emit error when function pointer invocation is encountered in an expression tree #61644
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Function Pointers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61651
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report a warning for multiple matches for implicit interface implementation of static member #61607
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Update compiler to supported UnmanagedMemoryStream when creating ModuleMetadata. #61630
    Area-IDE
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Fixed collection and object initializer usage analysis not working in top-level code #61584
    Area-IDE
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • Fix cancellation leaks #20111
    Area-IDE, cla-already-signed
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
